If Earth was a few degrees further Off our orbit, we'd freeze or Burn to death. Heck, when i studied in depth on circulatory systems of humans, if certain parts were placed differently they would not work. Personally, i'd rather die believing that i was created by a divine being than die believing i evolved from a hairy flea covered ape.Â
